Hero.description: RedBoxStudio is a collective of passionate developers and artists creating immersive experiences. We build worlds you'll want to get lost in.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.q1: Where can I play your games?
FAQ.a1: Our games are available on Google Play (Android) and Yandex Games (Web). You can find direct links on each game's detail page.
FAQ.a2: Yes! Most of our games are free-to-play with optional ads or in-app purchases to support development.
FAQ.a3: Playing our games, rating them on the store, and subscribing to our YouTube channel is the best way to support us!

Footer.description: Creating immersive mobile and web experiences.

pixel-vanguard.description: Dive into a cyber-enhanced pixel art world where ancient magic meets future tech. Battle through procedurally generated dungeons, upgrade your cybernetic enhancements, and uncover the secrets of the Vanguard.
pixel-vanguard.privacy: We collect minimal data to improve gameplay. No personal identifiers are stored without consent.

neon-drift.description: High-octane synthwave racing through endless procedural cityscapes. Master the drift mechanics, customize your retro ride, and compete on global leaderboards.
neon-drift.privacy: Leaderboard data is public. Device IDs are used for account recovery.

cosmic-miner.description: Build and manage your mining colony on a hostile alien planet. Defend against local fauna, optimize extraction routes, and terraform the surface.
cosmic-miner.privacy: Offline capable. Cloud save requires login.

future-prototype.description: An experimental simulation game pushing the boundaries of what's possible in web browsers. More details coming soon.

About.title: About Us
About.description: RedBoxStudio creates immersive games for mobile and web.
About.heroText: A collective of passionate developers and artists obsessed with quality and gameplay depth.
About.missionText1: Founded in 2025, we started with a simple belief: mobile games shouldn't feel disposable. We craft experiences that respect the player's intelligence and time.
About.missionText2: From procedural dungeons to complex simulations, we build worlds that matter.
